summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 25492, entitled "An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Engineer to incur an indebtedness in an amount not to exceed Three Hundred Eighty-six Dollars ($386.00) against the General Fund on account of the cost and expense of the improvement of Bellevue Court by paving, etc., as authorized by Ordinance No. 21734, creating Local Improvement District No. 2175," passed over Mayor's veto October 31st, 1910.
